name: Bat Encounter - Bat Carries Player
title: Bat Encounter - Bat Carries Player
description: Trigger bat encounter without garlic, causing bat to carry player to random location

entries.notes: Navigate to Bat Room - triggers bat encounter without garlic

expectedBehavior.batEncounter: A large vampire bat, hanging from the ceiling, swoops down at you!
expectedBehavior.batCarries: The bat grabs you by the scruff of your neck and lifts you away....
expectedBehavior.result: Player is transported to a random underground location
expectedBehavior.note: This only happens when player does NOT have garlic

notes: Bat encounter requires NOT having garlic from the kitchen sack
With garlic, bat will not attack and player can safely get jade figurine
Bat drops player at random location in the dungeon
Jade figurine (5 points) is in the Bat Room
Troll combat is random - may need multiple attempts

metadata.conversionNote: Converted from 'commands' format to 'entries' format - expectedOutput fields need to be populated
